north_star: Provide a seamless and efficient self-checkout experience for users through a robust mobile app and backend web components leveraging native cloud services.
mission: To build and maintain the self-checkout product, ensuring it delivers a high-quality, user-friendly experience while utilizing scalable and secure cloud infrastructure.
vision: To create a market-leading self-checkout solution that enhances customer satisfaction and operational efficiency through continuous innovation and seamless integration with cloud services.
values_principals: User-Centric: Focus on delivering an exceptional user experience.
Innovation: Continuously innovate to improve the self-checkout process.
Scalability: Ensure the solution can scale to meet growing user demand.
Security: Prioritize the security of user data and transactions.
Collaboration: Foster strong collaboration with other teams to ensure seamless integration and support.

team_structure.title: Team Lead
team_structure.responsibilities: Oversee team operations, prioritize tasks, and ensure alignment with broader goals.

team_structure.title: Mobile App Developer
team_structure.responsibilities: Develop and maintain the self-checkout mobile application.

team_structure.title: Backend Developer
team_structure.responsibilities: Develop and maintain backend web components and services.

team_structure.title: Cloud Engineer
team_structure.responsibilities: Ensure the backend services utilize scalable and secure cloud infrastructure.

team_structure.title: QA Engineer
team_structure.responsibilities: Test the application to ensure functionality, performance, and security.

team_structure.title: UI/UX Designer
team_structure.responsibilities: Design user interfaces that provide an intuitive and seamless checkout experience.

priorities: Develop and maintain the self-checkout mobile application.
Ensure backend services are scalable and secure.
Integrate seamlessly with cloud infrastructure and services.
Ensure the solution meets security and compliance standards.

meeting_cadence.purpose: Reflect on the past sprint and identify areas for improvement.

performance_metrics.justification: High user satisfaction indicates a successful and user-friendly self-checkout experience.
performance_metrics.measurement: Average score from user satisfaction surveys.

performance_metrics.justification: A high transaction success rate indicates a reliable and functional self-checkout process.
High uptime ensures the self-checkout service is always available to users.

performance_metrics.justification: Fast response times ensure a smooth and efficient user experience.
performance_metrics.measurement: Average time taken to complete a transaction.
